name: 劉世芸
objective:
本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
Textbook: In Detail (1) English for Global Communication
schedule:
w1: orientation (introducing the four skills of learning; the use   
    ofmemory in learning) 
w2: Unit 1 (Fashion) 
    Lesson: Fads and Fashions        plus: use of V-ing form 
w3:(cont.)                           plus: Listening ”the interview”
w4:(cont.)  Writing practice 
w5:Unit 2 (Couples)
w6:Lesson:Why couples stay together   
w7:(cont.)                            plus: relative clauses 
w8:review 
w9: mid-term exam 
w11: Unit 3 (Music) 
w12: Lesson: Change or die            plus: use of present perfect 
w13: (cont.)                          plus: listening 
w14: (cont.)                          plus: writing practice 
w15: Unit 4 (Soccer) 
w16: (cont.)                          plus: use of past perfect tense
w17: review 
w18: final exam
scorePolicy:
attendance / Q&A / tests = 40%
midterm exam = 30%
final exam = 30%
materials: collection of articles in form of handouts
